attributes.action: Fund the planting of new trees, hedges, and wildflowers and protect wildlife.
attributes.additional_details:
BBC News - More than a quarter of UK mammals face extinction
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/science-environment-49892209
attributes.background: There has been a steady decline since 1970 of British wildlife and habitats. More than a quarter of Uk mammals are at risk of extinction. There needs to be a significant plan in place to plant a lot of trees and create habitats for vulnerable animals.
